title: It said I got accepted to pbe testing
body: I made an account and then it brought me to where i sent my application in and I can't download the pbe tester thingy can somebody help?

replies.body:
Hmmmmm so the download link itself is sending you back to the sign-up page? If that's the case, let try using a different link to get you in.

See if the links on our [**Installing the PBE Client**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204894140-Installing-the-PBE-Client) page work any better for you! 

Note: There are two links right below the picture of Ziggs, one for Windows and one for Mac. Be sure to grab the right one ^_^!

Hello broporo, 
can i please have a pbe account

So we're not really the guys who pick and choose for PBE accounts, but be sure to keep an eye on your email just in case you do get picked. 

We send email confirmations to those who do get into PBE servers.
i got notified i was accepted but when i click the sign up link in the email the page won't load

I went ahead and looked over your account. I saw that your PBE account was created a little bit after you posted, so it seems like you got things working!

Hit me back up if you're still having issues, if not enjoy the PBE ^_^!
